title: Create a Reusable Toast Utility in Salesforce LWC
description: Learn how to build a reusable toast notification utility in Salesforce LWC to simplify success, error, warning, and info messages. Includes full folder structure, utility module, demo component, and code walkthrough.

title: How to Use getRelatedListRecords in LWC to Fetch Related List Data
description: Learn how to fetch related list records in Salesforce using the getRelatedListRecords UI API in LWC — without writing Apex. Includes full code for HTML, JS, and mapping LDS response to lightning-datatable.

title: How to Get All Contacts of an Account using DR
description: In this video, I explain how to retrieve all Contacts related to an Account in Salesforce using a DataRaptor (DR).

title: Increase Drop File Area in Lightning File Upload
description: In this video, I’ll show you how to expand the drop-zone area in Lightning File Upload to make it more user-friendly and enhance the overall UI experience.
